tool_description: Validates spacing between bathroom fixtures to ensure comfortable use, maintenance access, and code compliance with detailed clearance analysis.

toilet_center.description: Toilet center position [x, y] in feet

vanity_center.description: Vanity center position [x, y] in feet

shower_entry.description: Shower entry position [x, y] in feet

error_messages: Invalid fixture positions: Coordinates must be positive numbers within reasonable room bounds.
Invalid vanity width: Width must be between 18 and 72 inches.
Invalid shower dimensions: Dimensions must be between 30 and 96 inches.
Insufficient spacing: Fixtures too close together for safe and comfortable use.
Code violation: Spacing doesn't meet minimum building code requirements.
usage: Provide center positions for toilet and vanity, shower entry point, and fixture dimensions. The tool validates all spacing requirements and identifies any clearance issues.

toilet_to_vanity_spacing.description: Center-to-center distance between toilet and vanity in inches

toilet_to_shower_spacing.description: Distance from toilet to shower entry in inches

vanity_to_shower_spacing.description: Distance from vanity to shower entry in inches

spacing_adequacy.description: Overall spacing assessment: adequate, tight, or insufficient
